app._log_level_comment: Log levels: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL

delta_encoding._comment: Delta-Encoding: Sende nur geänderte Pixel. Threshold 8-bit: 0-20 (~3%), 16-bit: 1280-2560 (~2-4%)

universe_configs._comment: Pro Universum Kanal-Reihenfolge festlegen. Mögliche Werte: RGB, GRB, BGR, RBG, GBR, BRG

effects._transport_position_update_interval_comm: Send transport position WebSocket updates every N frames (lower = more updates, higher = less network traffic)
effects._comment: Default effect chains. video/artnet: arrays of effect configs. clips: array of effects applied to ALL clips

frontend._debug_logging_comment: Enable/disable console.log debug output in browser console (true/false). Use window.toggleDebug() to enable at runtime.
frontend._verbose_logging_comment: Extra verbose logging for development (even noisier than debug_logging)

commands._enabled_comment: Enable WebSocket command channels for low-latency control (play/pause/effects/layers)
commands._debounce_ms_comment: Debounce delay for parameter updates in milliseconds (lower = more responsive, higher = less network traffic)
commands._timeout_ms_comment: WebSocket command timeout before falling back to REST API (milliseconds)
commands._reconnect_attempts_comment: Number of reconnection attempts if WebSocket connection drops

websocket._comment: WebSocket command channels for low-latency control. Video preview uses MJPEG.

performance._comment: Frame caching optimization. enable_loop_cache: cache decoded frames for short loops. enable_rgb_cache: cache pre-computed RGB frames. Disable for debugging.

fullscreen._comment: Fullscreen stream settings. max_width=0 means no scaling (original size)

preview_stream._comment: MJPEG stream settings. fps: 25-60 recommended. max_width: 0 for original size. jpeg_quality: 1-100
